languages.text: "Полагаю, если я выброшу тебя в шлюз прямо сейчас, этот твой маршал спросит, где его служка? Что ж, так и быть. Только псину свою на цепь посади".
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, если я выброшу тебя в шлюз прямо сейчас, этот твой маршал спросит, где его служка? Что ж, так и быть. Только псину свою на цепь посади".

traits.locale_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from this Marshal of yours later? Very well, I acquiesce. As long as you keep your mutt on a chain."
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from this Marshal of yours later? Very well, I acquiesce. As long as you keep your mutt on a chain."
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from this Marshal of yours later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from this Marshal of yours later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."
"I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

languages.text: «Doy por hecho que su Mariscal tendría preguntas si le expulsara por una esclusa ahora mismo, de modo que acepto... siempre y cuando mantenga a ese chucho suyo atado en corto».
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: «Doy por hecho que su Mariscal tendría preguntas si le expulsara por una esclusa ahora mismo, de modo que acepto... siempre y cuando mantenga a ese chucho suyo atado en corto».

languages.text: “如果我现在把你扔出气闸，恐怕你那个元帅会追问我一大堆问题吧？好吧，我接受你的条件，但你得把你那条杂种狗给我拴好。”
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: “如果我现在把你扔出气闸，恐怕你那个元帅会追问我一大堆问题吧？好吧，我接受你的条件，但你得把你那条杂种狗给我拴好。”

languages.text: « Je présume que vous éjecter dans le vide séance tenante me vaudrait tout un tas de questions de la part de votre maréchal ? Puisque c'est ainsi, j'accepte... à condition que vous gardiez votre cabot en laisse. »
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: « Je présume que vous éjecter dans le vide séance tenante me vaudrait tout un tas de questions de la part de votre maréchal ? Puisque c'est ainsi, j'accepte... à condition que vous gardiez votre cabot en laisse. »

languages.text: 「今、君をエアロックから投げ出したら、後で君の将帥から質問されるだろうな？それなら仕方ない。{mf|俺|私}は受け入れるが、君の犬は鎖につないでおけ」
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: 「今、君をエアロックから投げ出したら、後で君の将帥から質問されるだろうな？それなら仕方ない。{mf|俺|私}は受け入れるが、君の犬は鎖につないでおけ」

languages.text: "İkinizi şu anda hava kilidinden attırsam Miralay'ın bu konuyu kurcalar, değil mi? Pekâlâ... İtini zincire vurduğun sürece kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: "İkinizi şu anda hava kilidinden attırsam Miralay'ın bu konuyu kurcalar, değil mi? Pekâlâ... İtini zincire vurduğun sürece kabul ediyorum."

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, der Marschall würde unangenehme Fragen stellen, wenn ich Euch aus einer Luftschleuse werfe, was? Also gut. Ich akzeptiere ... solange Ihr Euren Köter an die Kette legt."
languages.original_text: "I assume throwing you out of an airlock right now would prompt questions from your Marshal later? So be it: I accept — as long as you keep that mutt of yours on a chain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, der Marschall würde unangenehme Fragen stellen, wenn ich Euch aus einer Luftschleuse werfe, was? Also gut. Ich akzeptiere ... solange Ihr Euren Köter an die Kette legt."
